attributes.action: restrict booking and transaction fees on tickets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Various (perfectly legitimate) companies sell tickets for anything you want, be it for a concert, a train, or a sporting event. Each of them will add a booking fee on top of this, some will also add transaction fees as well. These can be anything up to 30% of the original ticket price, to be added on to the ticket itself. This differs from site to site and is frequently higher than it should be - I do not believe that paying potentially an additional £10 on top of a £30 ticket is necessary, especially when it has been bought using an internet-based system.

I do not disagree with booking fees to cover administrative costs, I am asking for there to be a cap on the amount that can be charged for a booking and transaction fee.
